title: Humanoid Robot Kinematics and Dynamics
description: Forward kinematics, Inverse kinematics (IK), Denavit-Hartenberg parameters, Dynamics (Forces and torques), PyBullet simulation, IK solvers (KDL, TRAC-IK).
